code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 62 yr old white male hardware engineer presents with 2 years history of mild persistent fatigue. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life he is a heavy drinker o:Height 165 cm, Weight 51.9 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed IRON - 65 mg daily, and ordered CBC, serum iron, TIBC.

s:pt presents with mild persistent fatigue and mild weakness. he is a white male aged 62 ys. he drinks at least 4 beers a day he denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 165 cm, Weight 52 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14 a:Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed IRON - 65 mg daily, and ordered CBC, serum iron, TIBC.
